2164.subject: MAE
2164.course_title_long: Technology as a Tool for Creativity, Equity & Excellence
2164.descrlong:
Participants explore current technologies and coming trends. "Technology" in this course is more than computers and digital media. Participants explore the issues created by these technologies. They look at tools that will help them use the potential of technology to support teaching and learning, and to develop thoughtful and powerful implementations of technologies in whatever educational setting they work.  (Offered fall and spring semesters as needed.)

(Restricted to MAE AND SPED Majors
